Psychic power runs thorough your blood, whether it be from a familial predisposition to psychic power or exposure to a powerful psychic phenomenon. Whatever the source of this power, your mind is a dangerous weapon.

Class Skill: Sense Motive.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rvf2gxyy1d4strae]{Mind Thrust I} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fa3oswb6t4drz74g]{Id Insinuation I} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z6xg1ckozmmx2s3q]{Ego Whip I} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.twthnjx7cnvfzez2]{Intellect Fortress I} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.199pl2cgawz38smh]{Psychic Crush I} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uid5nvg542oquom3]{Mental Barrier V} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fe4zq5n7gewou9mg]{Tower Of Iron Will III} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v39qnirlhgje2c0e]{Bilocation} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esugpfcs3zwbujt1]{Microcosm} (19th).

Bonus Feats: 

  • Focused Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O109YFcItBFUDHvu]{Heighten Spell}, 
  • Intuitive Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}, 
  • Logical Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{Persuasive},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{Quicken Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Sense Motive),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{Spell Focus}.

Bloodline Arcana: Your sorcerer spells and spell-like abilities count as psychic instead of arcane. You use thought and emotion components instead of verbal and somatic components when casting your spells.
